[‚Üê Back to commands index](./)

Send GP to another user.

**Usage**

- `/pay user:<user> amount:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `user` | `user` | Yes | The user you want to send the GP too. | - |
| `amount` | `string` | Yes | The amount you want to send. (e.g. 100k, 1m, 2.5b, 5*100m) | - |
